product_name: IGKGood Behavior Spirulina Protein Smoothing Blowout Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIGK's Good Behavior Smoothing Blowout Balm mimics the effects of a keratin treatment with 450° heat protection, 72 hr frizz control and added shine.
details: DetailsBenefits450°F heat protectantKey IngredientsBonding Polymers: Mimic the frizz-free, high-shine coating of a keratin treatment when activated by heatShea Butter: Moisturizes and softensFormulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfates (SLS or SLES)PetrolatumMineral OilItem 2575467How To UseBegin with small amount. Apply to wet hair evenly. Blow-dry in for smoothest results.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, PEG-150/Decyl Alcohol/SMDI Copolymer, Spirulina Maxima Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydroxyethyl Cetearamidopropyldimonium Chloride, Behenyl Alcohol, Steareth-2, Polyquaternium-55, Steareth-20, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Begin with small amount. Apply to wet hair evenly. Blow-dry in for smoothest results.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Love this product! Works very well in the Florida humidity

reviews.headline: Loving this product!
reviews.comments: I have wavy-curly hair and when there isn't any humidity, I have to style my hair straight. As the humidity kicks in, I need a product to control the frizz when I don't feel like wearing my hair super curly. This is it!! I am extremely sensitive to fragrance based products, and other ingredients, and I must say, I have no itchy reactions when using this product. (I have tried a lot!) Everyone has different hair textures and styling products that work great for them. I have been fortunate to find this product works with my hair!

reviews.headline: My Go To
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing. It was exactly what I was looking for. I will continue to buy.

reviews.headline: Love love love it!
reviews.comments: Love the smell of all of these products slowly getting every single one by one!

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! My hair is curly (so frizzy when i dont style it) and even gets frizzy after I blow dry. This completely smoothes it all out, especially near my face and base of my neck that gets really tiny, tight curls very easily.

reviews.headline: I wanted to like it
reviews.comments: I bought this as a recommendation from a stylist. I typically blow dry then flat iron my hair. I used to buy products with silicone, but they've all been discontinued. So, tried this. It is heavy, so you just use a little bit. It does blow dry and flat iron smooth, but it doesn't hold. I live in Louisiana, the minute I go outside, my hair swells up.

reviews.headline: Always keep on hand.
reviews.comments: Great product!

reviews.headline: Holy Grail for Curly Girls!
reviews.comments:
This is THE product I've been looking for to tame my frizz AND maintain the shape of my natural curls that does not contain dimethicone. That stuff just makes my fine hair look dirty and weighed down.
When I first read the description of this product, I thought it was only for straight hair styles. I decided to try it anyway since it was on sale. It is the first of many, many products I've tried that truly fights frizz for 3 days. Maybe it fights frizz longer, but I have to wash my hair every 3 days. 

Give it a shot! You can always return it if you dont like it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I have used this product a while

reviews.headline: Not Good
reviews.comments: Even when I tried to use a tiny amount of product it made my hair heavy, greasy and unmanageable. Maybe it's for a different hair type, but it's garbage for me.

reviews.headline: Silky and Sleek Blows -  Great Frizz Fighter
reviews.comments: Very pleased with this product in combo with IGK smoothing spray in this collection. I have curly hair and when using other heat styling products, my blowouts would be frizzy and curl as soon as I left the house (NYC.) Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Still In Shock
reviews.comments:
Some backstory - my hair can be extremely protein sensitive. I had just gone through a roller coaster after a protein-heavy shampoo overloaded my hair, and it took over a month of remedies to balance back out. Until my hair normalized, it was very brittle and broke off constantly, but with my stylist's help we got it under control and finally clarified the problem. She told me my hair needs some protein, but I'll have to be very caredul which products I use going forward. My 45-year-old hair is heavily foil-highlighted, on the thin side, and my ends tend to get dry while my roots can get oily a day or two  after washing. 
Fast forward to 2 weeks ago. I was traveling and forgot the smoothing cream/heat protector I normally use, so I stopped at Ulta to get something to get me through the week. Ulta doesn't carry the brand I was using, so I quickly grabbed this balm because the description sounded close to what I was using. I was in a mad hurry and I didn't check the ingredients (glad for that though, I never would've purchased it if i had!). Got it back to the hotel, read the ingredients, and almost immediately returned it because of all the additional proteins it contained alongside the Spirulina…I was sure it would be protein-overload again. Luckily, I was exhausted so I said heck with it and gave it a try. 
I was FLOORED. My hair was shiny, manageable, didnt break off when I flat ironed it, and I had no breakage from it being in a bun the entire next day. When it was time to wash, it didn't leave a ton of buildup behind and after several uses my hair still hasn't gotten overloaded with another protein nightmare. I dont know how or why this stuff works so amazingly for my hair, but it does, and I am so happy I gave it a chance!  My only caution is, if your hair is thin or fine, use a very minimal amount of this product. It is easy to use too much and then it tends to weigh down the hair/make it greasy a bit quicker. As long as I don't use too much, I get beautiful results every time! Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.headline: Finally a hair product that works!!
reviews.comments:
I wanted go purchase the spray version of this at the store because i used it and quite liked it. Unfortunately, it was totally sold out and there was one left of the balm. I said "why not? Its pretty much the same" 

NOOOO it was not the same! It's even BETTER!!! I have long, thick, frizzy, and wavy hair. No product has worked better than this balm to tame it. I apply my usual leave-ins, then go in with the balm in sections. (4 sections, pea sized amount for section for all my hair) I use the Revlon round brush. They work beautifully together. I feel like the heat from the round brush really activates the product nicely. 
Forreal keratin in a bottle omg. NEVER GET RID OF THIS IGK PLSSSSSS

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I have tried so many products for dry frizzy hair and finally, something that works!  I could tell instantly once I dried my hair that this stuff worked!  Two days later, still no frizz!  I'm sticking to this product for life and trying the rest of the line of shampoo and conditioner since this works so well!  It's worth the price.  Such a small amount goes a long way.

reviews.headline: absolutely love!!!!
reviews.comments: So there is a bit of a learning curve with this product; I find that it works best when applied in sections on already detangled hair.  It can be a bit sticky feeling if you try to apply it to the whole head at once.  It makes my unruly wavy hair so nice and smooth without having to fry it by excessively blow drying to get it as smooth as possible.  This, when used in small ammts,  gives me a quick, smooth and long lasting blow out.  The smell also...omg heavenly...reminds me of a very very beloved and popula fragrance.  I do find that this is better for a smooth straight blowout rather then one with Curled ends.  there is another igk product I prefer for that but I will absolutely repurchase (even though I think this tube will last for a very long time).  Also looking into the other products in this line.

reviews.headline: It really works
reviews.comments: It took me a long time to finally buy this, as I have bought so many other products claiming to tame frizz etc. This really works! My hair is fine and wavy and tends to frizz in the summer. Using this product results in a great looking blow out that actually lasts.

reviews.headline: There are better products
reviews.comments:
I love IGK products, but this missed all the marks. I have pretty managable hair, just need some heat protectio /smoothing help.  This made my hair feel both sticky & coarse/straw like.  Not smoothing or sleek.  We got an unexpected summer thunderstorm, and on a walk after the front of my hair was curly and the rest was very frizzy.  I don't have curly hair so I don't lnow what happened. I live in a low humidity environment, so a slight bump in humidity and this product completely missed the mark on same day application, much less multiple day protection.

I'll keep using the mistress line & a separate heat protectant with more consistent results.

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin beware
reviews.comments: I have thick curly hair and I've got to say this product does what it's meant to. I apply it to freshly washed towel-dried hair and either rough dry it or let it air dry to 80-90% then go in with a blow dry brush to finish up and smooth. The result is sleek and long-lasting. Unfortunately each time I've used it I've gotten a dermatitis rash around my hairline that goes away as soon as I wash my hair again and return to my regular products. In those cases this blow dry balm is the only thing that's different. I'm torn because it is effective but if you have sensitive or acne-prone skin you may want to avoid.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I got this to try as my normal go to ran out. From moment one i had a horrible experience. I squeezed it gently to get the product out and the opposite end of the container popped open, exploding half the container all over my sink. Every time I even used a small amount, my hair felt heavy and greasy. I don't have fine hair and have never had this problem. I threw what i salvaged away.

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way
reviews.comments: I have thick hair and with the product, you only need a small amount for a nice look. My only complaint is that after a few months of using the product, the top of the seam of the tube busted.

faceoff_positive.comments: IGK Good Behavior Smoothing Blowout Balm was a complimentary hair product Voxbox gave me to try and review. I really enjoy using this hair product. I felt like this blowout balm saved my hair and is now helping my hair to grow longer, healthier, and faster with a beautiful natural shine. I recommend two things, First please only use a small amount of this product in your hair and use this product for at least a mouth before deciding if this is a product for you or not. I like to squeeze a pea size amount onto the palm of my hand, then massage the product throughout my hands (like you would with a hand moisturizer) and then running my fingers and hands though the bottom of my hair and mid section making sure to spread the product evenly through my hair. Then blow dry and notice this creamy product immediately melting into the hair giving a lasting sleekness, shine and memory of a keratin treatment. It's like I just came from the salon getting salon blowout results but, in my own home. I also noticed less of my hair falling out in the shower from using this product. Remember less is more!!!!! While you will notice a difference in your hair after one use of this product you really want to use this product over a long period of time, if you want to receive the full benefits and results. This isn't that product where if you use the most in one shot you'll see greater result and in a faster time
faceoff_positive.headline: Healthier and longer .

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product for free. It's a nice balm not the best but I would definitely try it out.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice
